    http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/product/Ground/v2

    ValueWithAttributes LanguageInfo

      • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/product/Ground/v2:LanguageInfo

      • Description

        Language details pertaining to the service.

    • Example XML

      <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>

<LanguageInfo primaryLanguageInd="true" requestedInd="true" xmlns="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/product/Ground/v2">en</LanguageInfo>

      Example JSON

      {
  "LanguageInfo" : {
    "value" : "en",
    "primaryLanguageInd" : true,
    "requestedInd" : true
  }
}

      • Indicator Summary

        Indicators 
        Name Description
        primaryLanguageInd
        If true, this is the primary language spoken by the driver or the guide.
        requestedInd
        If true, it is preferred that the driver speak this language.
